Title: Prohibits access to video and audio recordings from smart surveillance devices without a warrant and voids contractual provisions permitting such access
Summary: Prohibits access to video and audio recordings from smart surveillance devices without a warrant; voids contractual provisions permitting such access.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to prohibiting access to video and audio recordings from smart surveillance devices without a warrant and voiding contractual provisions permitting such access
